mpa.demo()¶

mpathic.demo(example='simulation')¶

Runs a demonstration of mpathic.

Parameters:
example: (str)

A string specifying which demo to run. Must be ‘simulation’, ‘profile’, or ‘modeling’.
Returns:
None.
